Text: no subjectIts Renes Birthday Please join us for a party on SaturdayOctober pm Holcombe Penthouse The home of Dr Richard Meisch No gifts please If you wish well be collecting for the Houston Food Bank Were looking forward To seeing everyone then Houshyar Moarefi RSVP via email
Re Replacement of J Bolton Cc How about Hungarys at pm Cary will also be with us Houshyar

Re Replacement of J Bolton Cc Jim talked to me about his resignation again on Friday He indicated that he wished for his replacement to be chosen before he resigns I think he really thought he is helping the board by doing it this way I told him that I did not believe that it was appropriate to arrange things I also told him that he can remain on the board for as long as he lives in his unit And the board will replace him by seeking the best person to fill his seat for the remainder of his term when he resigns He indicated that in the past the next person getting the highest number of votes would be selected I informed him that while this had happened in the past but the board is not obligated to do it in this manner We should ask anyone who is interested to fill this seat to submit hisher name to be considered by the board Houshyar
